required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Repeated Doses of Lu AF35700 on Drug Metabolizing Enzymes
clinical_study.official_title: Interventional, Open-label, Multiple-dose Study to Investigate the Effects of Multiple Doses of Lu AF35700 on the Pharmacokinetics of Cytochrome P450 (CYP450) Substrates Dextromethorphan (CYP2D6), Caffeine (CYP1A2), Omeprazole (CYP2C19), and Midazolam (CYP3A4/5) in Healthy Young Adults

brief_summary.textblock: This study will help determine which types of drugs that may interact with Lu AF35700

primary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-inf): Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from zero to infinity
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours post dose on the following days: Day 1 and 27 for oral midazolam. Day 2 and 28 for cocktail components.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from zero to infinity for oral midazolam and metabolite and all drug cocktail components and their metabolites

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hours post dose on the following days: Day 1 and 27 for oral midazolam. Day 2 and 28 for Cocktail components.
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed concentration of oral midazolam and all drug cocktail components and their metabolites

arm_group.arm_group_label: Lu AF35700 and Cocktail of CYP450 substrates
arm_group.description: Day 1 oral midazolam administration, Day 2 Cocktail of CYP450 substrates administration. Daily Lu AF35700 administration from Day 5 to Day 28 with co-administration on Day 27 with oral midazolam and Day 28 with CYP450 substrate cocktail

intervention.arm_group_label: Lu AF35700 and Cocktail of CYP450 substrates
Lu AF35700 and Cocktail of CYP450 substrates

intervention.description: Caffeine tablets for oral use, 200 mg/day. Omeprazole tablets for oral use, 40 mg/day. Dextromethorphan tablets for oral use, 30 mg/day. Midazolam IV solution for Intravenous use, 0.025 mg/kg/day
intervention.arm_group_label: Lu AF35700 and Cocktail of CYP450 substrates

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body weight at least 50 kg and Body Mass Index 19 - 30 kg/m2
- Good general health ascertained by a detailed medical history, laboratory tests and physical examination
Exclusion Criteria:
-Pregnant or lactating women
Other protocol defined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply

overall_official.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S

condition_browse.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
